about_the_game:
Quote from a review by 'Bug'
In the world of gaming, few experiences match the adrenaline rush of a well-crafted shooter game. It is one such game that has captured my attention and held it with its gripping gameplay and challenging mechanics. The core objective of the game revolves around skill enhancement and character development. The game begins with a simple premise: escape the dungeon. However, as you delve deeper into its mechanics, you realize that this is no ordinary escape. Each level pushes you to strategically enhance your character’s skills, making them stronger, faster, and more resilient. The satisfaction of building up your character from scratch is immense.The true test comes when you’ve maxed out your character’s potential and the high-score mode is unlocked. Here, the game shifts gears from survival to glory as you strive to rack up as many points as possible.

Movement in the game is both intuitive and critical. Holding down the Aim button (Right Mouse Button) and using the W, A, S, D keys allows for seamless navigation through the treacherous dungeon corridors. But it’s not just about moving; it’s about moving with purpose. The Run button (Shift) becomes your best friend as you dash to avoid enemy attacks or close in for a strategic strike. The game teaches you that movement is not just a means of travel but a survival tool. Each decision to move or stay put can mean the difference between victory and defeat. This dynamic adds a layer of depth to what could have been a straightforward shooter.

It is more than just a shooter game; it’s a test of skill, strategy, and reflexes. It challenges you to think ahead, move wisely, and build your character into a formidable force. With its engaging mechanics, immersive sound design, and stunning graphics, the game stands out as a thrilling addition to any gamer’s collection. In conclusion, if you’re looking for a game that offers both challenge and reward in equal measure, It is worth your time. It’s a testament to how engaging gameplay mechanics can elevate the entire gaming experience.

This game was designed and tested in ultrawide (UWQHD) up to a resolution of 3440 x 1440. With a resolution almost three times higher than Full HD 1080p, ultrawide monitors offer plenty of on-screen gaming space without sacrificing performance. They look fantastic, don't crop image content like they might with 16:9 screens, and are easy on your graphics card.

ZomGoBo Key Features
- Sharpen your skills and conquer the dungeon's relentless horde!
- Unleash your fully-powered character in a furious high-score battle!
- Master the fluid movement mechanics: aim, move, and sprint to outmaneuver the enemy!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5 or equal
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce or equal
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7 or equal
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce or equal
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: ZomGoBo is a shooter game where the goal is to increase character skills and escape from the dungeon. Once the character is fully built up, the high-score mode is unlocked, where the objective is to achieve as many points as possible.
